programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: Wrongfully accused of trying to kill the president, framed Secret Service agent Mike Banning must evade the FBI and his own agency to uncover the truth and save the country from imminent danger.

programme.desc: A woman claiming to have been the victim of rape commits suicide while she is still in the emergency room.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: We sit down with Bruno Guimarães to trace his remarkable journey from the streets of Brazil to Premier League stardom with Newcastle United. Travelling back to South America, we meet the family, friends, and coaches who shaped his early years and believed in his dream. Bruno opens up about the sacrifices, setbacks, and defining moments that fuelled his rise, offering a heartfelt look at the person
